column1: Unconditional own-price elasticity for food subcategories, 144 countries, 2005 (marginal utility of income held constant)
Countries are reported based on ascending per capita real income levels.
a As the estimated budget shares for �food other� were negative, these values are calculated using the actual budget shares.
